response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. I believe in its potential to enrich your life or business significantly, and I am confident it will be worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its unique qualities and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to purchase this item for $9,500. This price reflects my desire to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the value for both parties.
